resources.string: AppZakat is the mobile application that was used to estimating zakat payment for gold keeping. This application was develop by students from UiTM Perlis. The students involved are Anis binti Roslan and Nurul Farhana Asyiqin binti Mohd Jamli.

Zakat is a form of obligatory charity that has the potential to ease the suffering of millions. With the literal meaning of the word being ‘to cleanse,’ Muslims believe that paying zakat purifies, increases and blesses the remainder of their wealth.
